Do you like empty seats?

We don’t like them either … that’s why we developed a solution for restaurants to attract more customers and increase their profits!

Let's get in touch And increase revenue togeter
Scroll for more

How it works

Your revenue is concentrated during peaks

Even the most successful restaurants have times and days when they are less busy. On average, the occupancy rate of a restaurant is only 36%, compared to +70% in other industries like flights and hotel bookings. Discoeat will dedicate you an account manager, who will firstly seat down with you to understand your specific needs.

How it works

Rent & staff also needs to be paid off-peak

Based on your demand curve, you will adjust prices to incentive new customers to discover your restaurant at the times you need them the most.

“You will have full control over the discount percentage and tables amount, so you can always make sure you’re making a profit while you improve your revenues”

How it works

Discoeat fills up your empty tables with new customers

Our product is made to discover great food. With your new dynamic prices, our team of marketing experts will do the rest, so you can focus on preparing food while we bring you more new and returning customers.

No longer you are on Discoeat, the bigger your customers pool will be and the more returning customers you will get.

Benefits for our partner restaurants

  • Increase
    your revenue

    Even the most successful restaurants experience less busy time periods. Bringing dynamic pricing into the restaurant environment, DiscoEat helps its partner restaurants to increase their revenues by filling otherwise empty seats, especially in off-peaks.

  • Dilute your fixed
    costs, not your brand

    Restaurants face high fixed costs with consistently increasing rents. DiscoEat helps to dilute these fixed costs through dynamic pricing. As the discount is given through us as a restaurant add-on, we ensure that there are no implications for your restaurant brand.

  • Attract and retain
    more customers

    DiscoEat is your ideal tool to access our pool of customers who are passionate about dining out and discovering new great restaurants. Our loyalty program incentivises customers to return to your restaurant frequently.

  • Strengthen your
    online presence

    On top of maximising your bookings, your DiscoEat profile increases your visibility and ranking on search engines. You benefit from complimentary marketing on all DiscoEat channels especially showcasing your restaurant to DiscoEat users.

Our tools

The place to be discovered

Our clear platform design and filters make it easy for users to find your restaurant. We are selective in our restaurant choice to attract the best customers for you!

Our “Try More” Credo:
DiscoEat users consume more as they use the saved amount to try more restaurants, dishes and drinks.

Our tools

An exceptional restaurant profile

Your individual restaurant profile boasts high resolution images, an excerpt of the menu, your story and general restaurant information to place you in the spotlight for every DiscoEat user.

It is designed to maximise your bookings and optimised to rank well on search engines and other marketing channels.

Our tools

A seamless order management tool

The best part about working with DiscoEat? No need to change your processes or constantly check the system! Manage your orders from any device that you already have in your restaurant.

Our customers arrive, show their DiscoEat reservation and you give them the reserved table – it’s simple.

Choose to learn more..it’s for free!
